title: How to Make Pecan Surprise

steps.headline: Prepare materials.
steps.description: Listed at the top of this article is everything you need to prepare this desert. Make sure you have all the ingredients needed, or substitutes for the ingredients you lack.

steps.headline: Melt the butter.
steps.description: Use the melted butter to mix the flour and the pecans together. After it is mixed together, pour it into a 9 x 13 inch baking dish.

steps.headline: Bake for 15 minutes.
steps.description: After the fifteen minutes is up, let it cool completely. Be careful so you don't burn yourself!

steps.headline: Beat together 1 cup of Cool Whip, cream cheese, and the powdered sugar.
steps.description: Pour this over the cooled crust.

steps.headline: Mix the third layer.
steps.description: Mix the two containers of instant pudding together using 3 cups of milk. Pour them over the cream cheese mixture.

steps.headline: Cover.
steps.description: Use the rest of the Cool Whip to cover the previous layer, and sprinkle it with grated pecan chips.

text: Prepare materials. Listed at the top of this article is everything you need to prepare this desert. Make sure you have all the ingredients needed, or substitutes for the ingredients you lack. Preheat oven. Heat your oven to 375 degrees. Melt the butter. Use the melted butter to mix the flour and the pecans together. After it is mixed together, pour it into a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. Bake for 15 minutes. After the fifteen minutes is up, let it cool completely. Be careful so you don't burn yourself! Beat together 1 cup of Cool Whip, cream cheese, and the powdered sugar. Pour this over the cooled crust. Mix the third layer. Mix the two containers of instant pudding together using 3 cups of milk. Pour them over the cream cheese mixture. Cover. Use the rest of the Cool Whip to cover the previous layer, and sprinkle it with grated pecan chips. Finished.
